statements: SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM UserCredentials WHERE last_login >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, last_login FROM UserCredentials WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM UserCredentials ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM UserCredentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM user_credentials JOIN user_roles ON user_credentials.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM user_credentials JOIN user_roles ON user_credentials.user_id = user_roles.user_id ORDER BY role_name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_name = 'admin';

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_permissions.permission_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT users.user_id AS id, users.username AS name, user_roles.role_name AS role FROM users INNER JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id ORDER BY users.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT session_id, user_id, login_time FROM sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
